title: Practical Competency Enhancement Program Based on the 4C/ID Model

context.prior_knowledge: At least 5 years of practical experience in social fields and completion of higher education
context.additional_context: Case-centered design to enhance applicability to current practitioners' work. Strengthening learning activities using smartphones

learning_goals: The four components of the 4C/ID model (learning objectives, supportive information, procedural information, part-task practice) can be applied to practical tasks
Learners can transfer 80% or more of learned content to actual work situations for solving complex social problems
Collaborative learning can achieve a 30% improvement in productivity when sharing knowledge with peer practitioners

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
